titleStmt.title: A briefe and piththie summe of the Christian faith made in forme of a confession, vvith a confutation of all such superstitious errours, as are contrary therevnto. Made by Theodore de Beza. Translated out of Frenche by R.F.
Confessio Christianae fidei. English
titleStmt.author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
Fills, Robert, fl. 1562.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Serll, dwelling in Flete lane, at the sygne of the halfe Eagle and the Key,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, imprint reads: sygne .. Eagle .. Key.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears on reels 451 and 1648 (same copy filmed twice).
